tasks.title: Validate momentum generalization
tasks.description: Run 5-window walk-forward validation for momentum. Use 70/30 train/test split per window. Calculate OOS decay (reject if >50%). Save results with in-sample and out-of-sample metrics to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Combine RSI with CCI for ES
tasks.description: Test combining RSI with CCI as entry filter on ES. Document hypothesis first. Run backtest with costs. Save results showing improvement vs single indicator to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Backtest mean reversion on RTY
